configuration.defaultValue: users:write, users:read, users:read.email, users.profile:read, users.profile:write, chat:write:user, search:read, files:read, files:write:user, channels:read, channels:write, channels:history, groups:read, groups:write, groups:history
configuration.description: Slack OAuth Scope. Enter multiple scopes separated with comma. For e.g. chat:write:bot, chat:write:user
configuration.name: OAuth Scope

configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.
configuration.name: Filter null values from the response

description: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.

resources.description: List all channels. To list all private channels, set the private parameter to true. Default setting is public.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For e.g. presence = '1'

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Boolean value to distinguish channel as a private or public channel. Default is public.

resources.description: Create a channel. To create a private channel set the private parameter to true. Default setting is public.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Boolean value to set new channel as public or private. Default is public.

resources.description: Retrieve information about a channel. To retrieve history of a private channel set the private parameter to true. Requesting a private channel ID without setting the private parameter to true will result in an error.

Call an action on a specific channel by passing the action in the request body. Supported actions are archive, unarchive, leave, rename, purpose, topic, and markAsRead. To call an action on a private channel, set the private parameter to true. Passing a private channel ID without setting the private parameter to true will result in an error. Default setting is public.

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Boolean value to set new channel as public or private. Default is public.

resources.description: List the history of messages in a channel. To list history of a private channel set the private parameter to true. Requesting a private channel ID without setting the private parameter to boolean will result in an error.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For e.g. oldest=1470863862.000004 AND count=1 AND unreads=1

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Set to true if channel is private rather than public. Default is public.

resources.description: Update a message in a channel
Delete a message in a channel
Create a me message in a channel
Create an invite for a user for a channel

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Boolean value to set new channel as public or private. Default is public.

resources.description: Delete a user from a channel

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Boolean value to specify channel as public or private. Default is public.

resources.description: Create a message in a channel
Search for files

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For e.g. types='images'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

resources.description: Upload a file
Delete a file
Retrieve a file information
Update the public status of a file. Supported actions are "share" and "revoke". Required scope is 'files:write:user'
Add a comment for a file
Update a comment for a file. Required scope is 'files:write:user'
Update a comment for a file
List all user groups.
Create a new user group.
Update a user group.
Update the status of a user group. Available actions are "enable" and "disable".
Updates the list of users that belong to the group.
List users in a user group.
Opens a direct message.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating if the message has a multiparty destination. Default is false.

resources.description: Permanently closes a direct message thread.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating if the message has a multiparty destination. Default is false.

resources.description: Returns history of messages in the specified thread. Optionally return history between 'latest' and 'oldest' timestamps.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating if the message has a multiparty destination. Default is false.

parameters.name: latest
parameters.description: The latest timestamp to return messages from. Formatted in milliseconds (e.g. 1234567890.123456).

parameters.name: oldest
parameters.description: The oldest timestamp to return messages from. Formatted in milliseconds (e.g. 1234567890.123456).

resources.description: Update the specified message thread to the "read" status. Body must include a "ts" (timestamp) field with the timestamp in milliseconds of what point in time to mark the message thread as "read".

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating if the message has a multiparty destination. Default is false.

resources.description: Search for messages and files

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. `query` field is mandatory. For e.g. query = 'hello' . Other fields can also be provided such as, query = 'hello' AND sort_dir='asc'

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

resources.description: Search for files

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. `query` field is mandatory. For e.g. query = 'hello' . Other fields can also be provided such as, query = 'hello' AND sort_dir='asc'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

resources.description: Search for messages

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. `query` field is mandatory. For e.g. query = 'hello' . Other fields can also be provided such as, query = 'hello' AND sort_dir='asc'

resources.description: test the Authentication
Let server know that authenticated user is currently active. This method may only be used by tokens with the 'users:write' scope
List the user identity. This method may only be used by tokens with the 'identity.basic' scope
Update a calling user's manual presence

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The users presence object body, the required field is "presence" which can be set to "auto" or "away".

resources.description: Update the profile information for a user. This method may only be used with the 'users.profile:write' scope
get a channel history

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating if multiparty messages should be returned. Default is false, returning single party messages.

resources.description: List the user's presence information
Retrieve the profile information for a user. This method may only be used with the 'users.profile:read' scope
Retrieve a user. This method may only be used by tokens with the 'users:read' scope
List all users. This method may only be used by tokens with the 'users:read' scope

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For e.g. presence = '1'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

name: Slack
